page.title: 01SUMMARY
page.content: Located on the East coast of Scotland,in Fife Region,Leuchars is a large village of 2980 people.To the south-east lies the University town of St Andrews, while to the north ,across the Firth of Tay and linked by the Tay Bridge is the city of Dundee. The surrounding land is dominated by both prosperous farmland and forestry.The extensive Tentsmuir Forest is owned by the Forestry Commission, and provides timber for commercial usage, and recreational facilities for visitors. Much of the population of Leuchars is composed of R.A.F. personnel - they are stationed at R.A.F. Leuchars and are provided with housing and social facilites. The R.A.F. base itself occupies much of the land of the village.The village of Leuchars itself provides a few services and contains a picturesque Norman Church.
